name: Terminal Garden
description:
Terminal Garden Role: Level Designer, Programmer, UI Designer, Post-processing and Visual Effects Designer Engine: Unity 3D Controls:

See "help" command in game

Terminal Garden is a terminal simulator in which players act as a robot whose mission is to complete quest and save the corrupting virtual garden. Players can only interact with this world by typing commands in the terminal, and all panels are like windows in a real computer.

There are mysteries everywhere in this world, and completing quests in different ways may result in different consequences. Paying attention to the NPC's actions may help players discover how the quests will affect the ending of the world.
